attributes.action: preserve the jobs of thousands of rail workers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the Government should change its mind on its decision to select Japanese-led consortium Agility ahead of Derby train-maker Bombardier as the preferred bidder for a £7.5bn contract to build new Intercity trains.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to preserve the jobs of thousands of rail workers.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=Bombardier


Her Majesty's Government
